nodes.text: The Zanbar Death Watch camp was constructed by the Mandalorian splinter group Death Watch on the moon Zanbar after they made it their temporary base of operations following their abandonment of the planet Carlac.

After discovering the renegade Sith Lord Maul and his Sith brother Savage Opress unconscious in their escape pod, Pre Vizsla and Bo-Katan Kryze took the brothers to their camp and eventually allied with them, forming the Shadow Collective. Later, the Pyke Syndicate would travel to their camp to request to join their criminal alliance, which Vizsla and Maul accepted.
